sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM PTP WHERE LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN# AND RELATED_NE_CUID=#RELATED_NE_CUID#
SELECT C.CARDTYPE_NAME,D.LABEL_CN FROM CARD_KIND C,DEVICE_VENDOR D WHERE C.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID=D.CUID

SELECT A.CUID FROM NE_MODEL_CFG_TYPE A , DEVICE_VENDOR B WHERE A.VENDOR_NAME = B.CUID AND B.LABEL_CN = #VENDOR_NAME# AND A.PRODUCT_MODEL = #PRODUCT_MODEL# AND A.SIGNAL_TYPE = #SIGNAL_TYPE# AND A.CFG_TYPE = #CFG_TYPE#
SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN FROM CARD WHERE RELATED_DEVICE_CUID = #CUID#
SELECT N.PRODUCT_MODEL,D.LABEL_CN FROM NE_MODEL_CFG_TYPE N,DEVICE_VENDOR D WHERE N.VENDOR_NAME=D.CUID
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO NE_MODEL_CFG_TYPE (OBJECTID,GT_VERSION,VENDOR_NAME, CFG_TYPE,PRODUCT_MODEL,MAX_RATE,SIGNAL_TYPE,CUID, ISDELETE,CREATE_TIME,LAST_MODIFY_TIME) VALUES( #OBJECTID#, #GT_VERSION#, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM DEVICE_VENDOR WHERE LABEL_CN = #VENDOR_NAME#), #CFG_TYPE#, #PRODUCT_MODEL#, #MAX_RATE#, #SIGNAL_TYPE#, #CUID#, #ISDELETE#, #CREATE_TIME#, #LAST_MODIFY_TIME# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM t_attemp_GPON_COVER WHERE RELATED_NE_CUID IN
#related_ne_cuid[]#

SELECT * FROM T_ROFH_CUSTOMER WHERE LABEL_CN IN
#label_cn[]#

SELECT * FROM TRANS_ELEMENT WHERE LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#

SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN,FDN,RELATED_EMS_CUID,'1' AS DEV_TYPE FROM TRANS_ELEMENT WHERE LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#
UNION SELECT P.CUID,P.LABEL_CN,T.FDN,P.RELATED_EMS_CUID,'3' AS DEV_TYPE FROM AN_POS P,TRANS_ELEMENT T WHERE T.CUID=P.RELATED_OLT_CUID AND P.LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#

SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN FROM PTP WHERE LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#

SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN,RELATED_OLT_CUID,FDN,DEV_CUID,RELATED_VENDOR_CUID,OWNERSHIP,'1' AS POSTYPE FROM t_attemp_AN_POS WHERE LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#

SELECT * FROM t_attemp_AN_ONU WHERE LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#

SELECT LABEL_CN,CUID ,FDN ,RELATED_DEVICE_CUID,MODEL,RELATED_UPPER_COMPONENT_CUID FROM t_attemp_CARD WHERE LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#

SELECT LABEL_CN,CUID ,FDN ,PORT_NO ,PORT_RATE,PORT_TYPE,VLAN, REMARK FROM t_attemp_PTP WHERE LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#

SELECT LABEL_CN,CUID,FDN,'AN_OLT-' AS DEV_CUID FROM TRANS_ELEMENT T WHERE T.LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#
UNION SELECT LABEL_CN,CUID,FDN,DEV_CUID FROM AN_ONU A WHERE A.LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#
UNION SELECT LABEL_CN , CUID, FDN,DEV_CUID FROM AN_POS S WHERE S.LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#

SELECT LABEL_CN,CUID,FDN,RELATED_NE_CUID FROM t_attemp_PTP WHERE LABEL_CN in
#name[]#

SELECT LABEL_CN,CUID,DISTRICT_CUID ,SITE_CUID ,LOCATION ,LONGITUDE , LATITUDE ,VP_CONTACT , VP_PHONE ,MAINTAIN_MAN ,MAINTAIN_PHONE FROM ACCESSPOINT WHERE LABEL_CN IN
#name[]#
SELECT CUID FROM NE_MODEL_CFG_TYPE WHERE SIGNAL_TYPE = 9 AND CFG_TYPE = #CFG_TYPE# AND VENDOR_NAME in (SELECT CUID FROM DEVICE_VENDOR D WHERE D.LABEL_CN = #producter#) AND PRODUCT_MODEL = #model#

SELECT LABEL_CN,RELATED_SPACE_CUID FROM SITE WHERE RELATED_SPACE_CUID IN
#name[]#
SELECT LABEL_CN,FDN,CUID FROM NMS_SYSTEM WHERE LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
SELECT CUID FROM ROOM R WHERE R.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
SELECT CUID FROM T_PHY_SHELFRACK_UNIT R WHERE R.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
SELECT CUID FROM SITE S WHERE S.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
SELECT RELATED_SITE_CUID FROM ROOM S WHERE S.CUID = #CUID#
SELECT CUID FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
SELECT CUID FROM DEVICE_VENDOR D WHERE D.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ACCESSPOINT SET LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN#, DISTRICT_CUID=#DISTRICT_CUID#, SITE_CUID=#SITE_CUID#, LOCATION=#LOCATION#, VP_CONTACT=#VP_CONTACT#, VP_PHONE=#VP_PHONE#, MAINTAIN_MAN=#MAINTAIN_MAN#, MAINTAIN_PHONE=#MAINTAIN_PHONE#, LAST_MODIFY_TIME=#LAST_MODIFY_TIME#, LONGITUDE=#LONGITUDE#, LATITUDE=#LATITUDE# WHERE CUID = #CUID#

UPDATE TRANS_ELEMENT SET LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN#, STANDARD_NAME=#STANDARD_NAME#, RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID=#RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID#, RELATED_ROOM_CUID=#RELATED_ROOM_CUID#, RELATED_SITE_CUID=#RELATED_SITE_CUID#, RELATED_EMS_CUID=#RELATED_EMS_CUID#, LOCATION=#LOCATION#, FDN=#FDN#, MODEL=#MODEL#, DEV_IP=#DEV_IP#, RELATED_VENDOR_CUID=#RELATED_VENDOR_CUID#, SEQNO=#SEQNO#, SOFT_VERSION=#SOFT_VERSION#, REAL_LONGITUDE=#REAL_LONGITUDE#, REAL_LATITUDE=#REAL_LATITUDE#, RELATED_PROJECT_CUID=#RELATED_PROJECT_CUID#, LIVE_CYCLE=#LIVE_CYCLE#, SETUP_TIME=#SETUP_TIME#, BACK_NETWORK_TIME=#BACK_NETWORK_TIME#, CHECK_LABEL_NUMBER=#CHECK_LABEL_NUMBER#, OWNERSHIP=#OWNERSHIP#, OWNERSHIP_MAN=#OWNERSHIP_MAN#, ONU_TYPE=#ACCESS_TYPE#, CREATOR=#CREATOR#, CREATTIME=#CREATTIME#, MAINT_MODE=#MAINT_MODE#, PRESERVER=#PRESERVER#, PRESERVER_ADDR=#PRESERVER_ADDR#, PRESERVER_PHONE=#PRESERVER_PHONE#, REPAIR_TIME=#REPAIR_TIME#, CONTINUE_REPAIR_TIME=#CONTINUE_REPAIR_TIME#, EQUIPMENTCODE=#EQUIPMENTCODE#, EQUIPMENT_GROUP_CODE=#EQUIPMENT_GROUP_CODE#, RELATED_RACK_CUID =#RELATED_RACK_CUID#, IS_PRIORITY=#IS_PRIORITY#, COVER=#COVER#, MAINT_PERSON = #MAINT_PERSON#, DATA_QUALITY_PERSON=#DATA_QUALITY_PERSON# WHERE CUID = #CUID#

UPDATE CARD SET LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN#, RELATED_DEVICE_CUID=#RELATED_DEVICE_CUID#, MODEL=#MODEL#, FDN=#FDN#, RELATED_UPPER_COMPONENT_CUID=#RELATED_UPPER_COMPONENT_CUID#, LAST_MODIFY_TIME=#LAST_MODIFY_TIME#, DEV_TYPE = #DEV_TYPE# WHERE CUID = #CUID#

UPDATE PTP SET LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN#, PORT_NO=#PORT_NO#, PORT_RATE=#PORT_RATE#, PORT_TYPE=#PORT_TYPE#, PORT_SUB_TYPE=#PORT_SUB_TYPE#, PORT_STATE=#PORT_STATE#, VLAN=#VLAN#, REMARK=#REMARK#, FDN=#FDN#, DEV_TYPE = #DEV_TYPE#, RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID = #RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID#, RELATED_CARD_CUID=#RELATED_CARD_CUID#, RELATED_EMS_CUID=#RELATED_EMS_CUID#, RELATED_NE_CUID=#RELATED_NE_CUID#, LAST_MODIFY_TIME=#LAST_MODIFY_TIME# WHERE CUID = #CUID#

UPDATE AN_POS SET LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN#, STANDARD_NAME=#STANDARD_NAME#, RELATED_ROOM_CUID=#RELATED_ROOM_CUID#, RELATED_EMS_CUID=#RELATED_EMS_CUID#, RELATED_PORT_CUID=#RELATED_PORT_CUID#, SEC_RELATED_PORT_CUID=#SEC_RELATED_PORT_CUID#, CAN_ALLOCATE_TO_USER=#CAN_ALLOCATE_TO_USER#, LOCATION=#LOCATION#, RELATED_ACCESS_POINT=#RELATED_ACCESS_POINT#, RELATED_OLT_CUID=#RELATED_OLT_CUID#, MODEL=#MODEL#, RELATED_VENDOR_CUID=#RELATED_VENDOR_CUID#, OWNERSHIP=#OWNERSHIP#, OWNERSHIP_MAN=#OWNERSHIP_MAN#, MAINT_PERSON = #MAINT_PERSON#, DATA_QUALITY_PERSON=#DATA_QUALITY_PERSON#, SEQNO=#SEQNO#, REAL_LONGITUDE=#REAL_LONGITUDE#, REAL_LATITUDE=#REAL_LATITUDE#, RELATED_PROJECT_CUID=#RELATED_PROJECT_CUID#, LIVE_CYCLE=#LIVE_CYCLE#, SETUP_TIME=#SETUP_TIME#, BACK_NETWORK_TIME=#BACK_NETWORK_TIME#, RATION=#RATION#, RELATED_CAB_CUID=#RELATED_CAB_CUID#, PRESERVER=#PRESERVER#, MAINT_MODE=#MAINT_MODE#, CREATTIME=#CREATTIME#, REPAIR_TIME=#REPAIR_TIME#, FDN=#FDN# WHERE CUID = #CUID#

UPDATE AN_ONU SET LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN#, STANDARD_NAME=#STANDARD_NAME#, RELATED_ROOM_CUID=#RELATED_ROOM_CUID#, RELATED_EMS_CUID=#RELATED_EMS_CUID#, LOCATION=#LOCATION#, RELATED_ACCESS_POINT=#RELATED_ACCESS_POINT#, RELATED_OLT_CUID=#RELATED_OLT_CUID#, RELATED_POS_CUID=#RELATED_POS_CUID#, MODEL=#MODEL#, DEV_IP=#DEV_IP#, LIVE_CYCLE=#LIVE_CYCLE#, SOFT_VERSION=#SOFT_VERSION#, RELATED_VENDOR_CUID=#RELATED_VENDOR_CUID#, OWNERSHIP=#OWNERSHIP#, OWNERSHIP_MAN=#OWNERSHIP_MAN#, REAL_LONGITUDE=#REAL_LONGITUDE#, REAL_LATITUDE=#REAL_LATITUDE#, RELATED_PROJECT_CUID=#RELATED_PROJECT_CUID#, SETUP_TIME=#SETUP_TIME#, BACK_NETWORK_TIME=#BACK_NETWORK_TIME#, FTTX=#FTTX#, ONU_TYPE=#ONU_TYPE#, ONU_ID=#ONU_ID#, AUTH_TYPE=#AUTH_TYPE#, PASSWORD=#PASSWORD#, LOGICID=#LOGICID#, MAC_ADDR=#MAC_ADDR#, SEQNO=#SEQNO#, CREATTIME=#CREATTIME#, MAINT_MODE=#MAINT_MODE#, LAST_MODIFY_TIME=#LAST_MODIFY_TIME#, PORT_NUMBER = #PORT_NUMBER#, MAINT_PERSON = #MAINT_PERSON#, DATA_QUALITY_PERSON=#DATA_QUALITY_PERSON# FDN=#FDN# WHERE CUID = #CUID#

UPDATE PON_TOPO_LINK SET LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN#, NATIVE_NAME=#NATIVE_NAME#, FDN=#FDN#, USER_LABEL=#USER_LABEL#, RELATED_EMS_CUID=#RELATED_EMS_CUID#, LAYER_RATE=#LAYER_RATE#, DIRECTION=#DIRECTION#, ORIG_NE_CUID=#ORIG_NE_CUID#, ORIG_PTP_CUID=#ORIG_PTP_CUID#, DEST_NE_CUID=#DEST_NE_CUID#, REMARK=#REMARK#, DEST_PTP_CUID=#DEST_PTP_CUID# WHERE CUID = #CUID#

UPDATE GPON_COVER SET DEVICE_TYPE=#DEVICE_TYPE#, RELATED_NE_CUID=#RELATED_NE_CUID#, USE_PROPERTY=#USE_PROPERTY#, ONTINADDR=#ONTINADDR#, COVER_RANGE=#COVER_RANGE#, RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID=#RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID#, BUILD_NAME=#BUILD_NAME#, MAINCOMP=#MAINCOMP#, PRO_RIGHT=#PRO_RIGHT#, LONGITUDE=#LONGITUDE#, LATITUDE=#LATITUDE#, PROJECT_NO=#PROJECT_NO#, REMARK=#REMARK# WHERE CUID = #CUID#
UPDATE T_ROFH_CUSTOMER SET CUID=#CUID#, LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN#, CUSTOMER_CODE=#CUSTOMER_CODE#, EMAIL_ADDRESS=#EMAIL_ADDRESS#, CUSTOMER_ADDRESS=#CUSTOMER_ADDRESS#, REMARK=#REMARK# WHERE CUID = #CUID#

INSERT INTO GPON_COVER (CUID, OBJECTID, DEVICE_TYPE, RELATED_NE_CUID, USE_PROPERTY, ONTINADDR, COVER_RANGE, RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, BUILD_NAME, MAINCOMP, PRO_RIGHT, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, PROJECT_NO, REMARK) VALUES (#CUID#, #OBJECTID#, #DEVICE_TYPE#, #RELATED_NE_CUID#, #USE_PROPERTY#, #ONTINADDR#, #COVER_RANGE#, #RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID#, #BUILD_NAME#, #MAINCOMP#, #PRO_RIGHT#, #LONGITUDE#, #LATITUDE#, #PROJECT_NO#, #REMARK#)
INSERT INTO T_ROFH_CUSTOMER (CUID, LABEL_CN, CUSTOMER_CODE, EMAIL_ADDRESS, CUSTOMER_ADDRESS, REMARK) VALUES (#CUID#, #LABEL_CN#, #CUSTOMER_CODE#, #EMAIL_ADDRESS#, #CUSTOMER_ADDRESS#, #REMARK#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM T_ROFH_CUSTOMER WHERE LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
SELECT * FROM PON_WAY_ANMS WHERE ACCOUNT_NAME = #ACCOUNT_NAME#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PON_WAY_ANMS (CUID, OBJECTID, LABEL_CN, RELATED_ONU_CUID, ONU_TYPE_CUID, ONU_PORT_CUID, RELATED_LIGHT_CUID, LIGHT_PORT_CUID, RELATED_OLT_CUID, OLT_PON_PORT_CUID, RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, SVLAN, CVLAN, VP_CUID, ACCOUNT_NAME, ONU_IN_ADDR, BUSINISS_TYPE_CUID, CREATE_TIME, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, BAND_WIDTH) VALUES (#CUID#, #OBJECTID#, #LABEL_CN#, #RELATED_ONU_CUID#, #ONU_TYPE_CUID#, #ONU_PORT_CUID#, #RELATED_LIGHT_CUID#, #LIGHT_PORT_CUID#, #RELATED_OLT_CUID#, #OLT_PON_PORT_CUID#, #RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID#, #SVLAN#, #CVLAN#, #VP_CUID#, #ACCOUNT_NAME#, #ONU_IN_ADDR#, #BUSINISS_TYPE_CUID#, #CREATE_TIME#, #LAST_MODIFY_TIME#, #BAND_WIDTH# )

INSERT INTO GPON_BUSI_TYPE (CUID, OBJECTID, GT_VERSION, BUSI_TYPE_NAME, BUSI_NAME_ABR, USE_TYPE, IS_RESERVE, REMARK, ISDELETE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, PUBLIC_BUSINESS_TYPE ) VALUES (#CUID#, #OBJECTID#, #GT_VERSION#, #BUSI_TYPE_NAME#, #BUSI_NAME_ABR#, #USE_TYPE#, #IS_RESERVE#, #REMARK#, #ISDELETE#, #CREATE_TIME#, #LAST_MODIFY_TIME#, #PUBLIC_BUSINESS_TYPE# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM AN_ONU WHERE CUID = #CUID#
SELECT * FROM AN_POS WHERE CUID = #CUID#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TRANS_ELEMENT SET DEV_MAINTAIN=#DEV_MAINTAIN#, LINE_MAINTAIN=#LINE_MAINTAIN# WHERE CUID = #CUID#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.CUID,T.LABEL_CN,T.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID FROM TRANS_ELEMENT T WHERE T.SIGNAL_TYPE=9 AND T.CONFIG_TYPE=1 AND T.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
AND T.STANDARD_NAME = #STANDARD_NAME#
AND T.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID LIKE #RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID#
SELECT D.CUID,D.LABEL_CN FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
SELECT S.CUID,S.LABEL_CN FROM T_EXT_RADIO_MAINTAIN S WHERE S.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
